title: To Shatter the Night
description: After escaping the mist, Kiara and Jude are pursued by a vengeful god hell-bent on stopping them from breaking the curse that torments the realm, in this sequel to the highly anticipated debut YA fantasy, To Kill a Shadowâ€¦The Mistlands Duology is best enjoyed in order.Reading Book #1 To Kill a ShadowBook #2 To Shatter the Night
author: Katherine  Quinn
